member.name: P:PagueMenos.DataContracts.Product.ProductDataContract.Code
member.summary: GTIN code of 13 digits (for US and Canada : 12 digits prexifed with 0)

member.name: P:PagueMenos.DataContracts.Product.ProductDataContract.Weight
member.summary: The measure weight in Gramme. Measure concerns the internal unit , not the full pack.

member.name: P:PagueMenos.DataContracts.Product.ProductDataContract.Volume
member.summary: The measure volume in millilitres. Measure concerns the internal unit , not the full pack.

member.name: P:PagueMenos.DataContracts.Product.ProductDataContract.Unity
member.summary: Number of units in the product. Example: 6 bottles in a commercialized pack (to be able to display 6 x 330ml ).
